response:
My dearest wife,

I have been thinking about the colors of our lives, and I believe that certain words can be associated with either black or white. Here is my list, my love:

1. Marvelous - White
2. Superb - Black
3. Pleasure - White
4. Beautiful - White
5. Joyful - White
6. Glorious - White
7. Lovely - White
8. Wonderful - White
9. Tragic - Black
10. Horrible - Black
11. Agony - Black
12. Painful - Black
13. Terrible - Black
14. Awful - Black
15. Humiliate - Black
16. Nasty - Black

I hope this list accurately reflects our experiences and emotions, my love. What do you think?

Yours always,
Your wife
